human.name: Human
human.description: An adaptable hiker whose stubborn hope and trail savvy survive even portal fire.

camp: You warm your hands by the fire.

human.summary: An adaptable hiker whose stubborn hope and trail savvy survive even portal fire.

wolf_kin.name: Wolf-Kin
wolf_kin.description: Nose full of forest scents and muscles coiled to sprint, a wolf-kin is never far from the wild.

camp: You shake out your fur by the fire.

wolf_kin.summary: Nose full of forest scents and muscles coiled to sprint, a wolf-kin is never far from the wild.

cow_kin.name: Cow-Kin
cow_kin.description: Herbivorous and sturdy, cow-kin bring a calm, steady presence to the wild forest.

camp: You settle comfortably by the fire, your hooves tucked beneath you.

cow_kin.summary: Herbivorous and sturdy, cow-kin bring a calm, steady presence to the wild forest.

elf.name: Elf (Wilder Elf)
elf.description: Wilder elves feel the forest's pulse in ways others cannot, their connection to nature running deep.

camp: You listen to the forest's subtle rhythms as you rest.

elf.summary: Wilder elves feel the forest's pulse in ways others cannot, their connection to nature running deep.

dwarf.name: Dwarf (Stoneborn)
dwarf.description: Stoneborn dwarves carry the weight of mountains in their bones, steady and unshakeable.

camp: You feel the earth's warmth through your boots as you rest.

dwarf.summary: Stoneborn dwarves carry the weight of mountains in their bones, steady and unshakeable.

lizard_folk.name: Lizard-Folk
lizard_folk.description: Scaled and alert, lizard-folk navigate the forest with precise instincts and keen awareness.

camp: You bask in the fire's warmth, your scales reflecting the light.

lizard_folk.summary: Scaled and alert, lizard-folk navigate the forest with precise instincts and keen awareness.

deer_kin.name: Deer-Kin
deer_kin.description: Graceful and alert, deer-kin move through the forest with quiet elegance and sharp senses.

camp: You settle gracefully by the fire, ears twitching at distant sounds.

deer_kin.summary: Graceful and alert, deer-kin move through the forest with quiet elegance and sharp senses.

fox_kin.name: Fox-Kin
fox_kin.description: Clever and quick, fox-kin bring a playful cunning to survival in the wild forest.

camp: You curl up by the fire, your tail wrapped around you for warmth.

fox_kin.summary: Clever and quick, fox-kin bring a playful cunning to survival in the wild forest.

gryphon_folk.name: Gryphon-Folk
gryphon_folk.description: Anthropomorphic gryphons with the keen eyes of eagles and the strength of lions, masters of wind and sky.

camp: You settle by the fire, your feathers ruffling in the breeze.

gryphon_folk.summary: Anthropomorphic gryphons with the keen eyes of eagles and the strength of lions, masters of wind and sky.

dragonborn.name: Dragonborn
dragonborn.description: Anthro dragons whose draconic heritage shows in scales, presence, and an ancient connection to magic.

camp: You rest by the fire, your scales gleaming with inner warmth.

dragonborn.summary: Anthro dragons whose draconic heritage shows in scales, presence, and an ancient connection to magic.
